resources.string:
Feel the Feels Mood Assessment App is meant to help the user identify their mood only. Keeping track of your mood may help you to notice patterns or help you make healthier lifestyle choices.

THIS APP IS NOT MEANT TO DIAGNOSE OR TREAT MOOD DISORDERS.

This app was created by: Natasha Lucio

 **Mood summaries provided by https://www.disabled-world.com/disability/awareness/mood-colors.php

 Published: 2018-09-12 - Updated: 2022-01-03

 Author: Disabled World**
